website_summaries.verdict: 2-product kit incorporates active ingredients such as salicylic acid, tea tree oil, and benzoyl peroxide in a morning and night regimen.
pros: Praised as effective by most users
We like this treatment because it is a relatively simple, 2-step regimen that combines three active ingredients known to successfully combat acne
Also, it's on the lower end cost-wise, and smells lovely!
cons: A few users didn't see the results they hoped for
Though it can be noted that acne treatments need to be used consistently, and for more than just a few days, to really give them a chance to work

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the yellow stuff
customer_reviews.text: Ever since attempting to play with MAC makeup about 3 years ago, I developed acne. Mild Cystic acne//Hormonal acne but this truly ,(in combination with Drunk Elephant products), saved my skin and has helped balance the redness/ stops reoccurring pimples just settling in. I absolutely love the yellow stuff, and initially was indifferent to the herbal/ minty smell. I've since grown to like it; it feels very hydrating and therapeutic to put on every morning as a part of my skin care routine! Also Note: My sensitive skin hasn't been burnt/ irritated by this product; only cleared!! Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible reaction to the PM regimen- I think I am sensitive/allergic to benzoyl peroxide. When I informed the company they gave me full refund even though I do use the AM cream- it seems pretty good. 1. A+ for customer service 2. Well packaged, nice looking bottles 3. AM cream is good ***Warning*** When using the PM regimen- start very slow- use less than one pump the first time and gradually build up if it's working for you. benzoyl peroxide is strong stuff and it took me a week to recover
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Dualosophy for a few months and my face is now clear. I am in my late twenties and have been dealing with acne since middle school. I have tried every topical and oral medication out there including Accutane (twice!) and still my face would not clear up entirely. I now use Dualosophy every day along with Neutrogena Acne Stress Control Power-Clear Scrub and Toner. My skin is clear, glowing, and looks so healthy!! I have very sensitive skin that tends to turn red when I use most products, but it doesn't with this. I will be a lifelong customer.
customer_reviews.author: JRO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, and cruelty free
customer_reviews.text: I am finally breaking down and reviewing this product. It's awesome. Buy it. I was having terrible post-partum acne and I tried several different products. Nothing worked. Since I started using this product I don't think I've had one breakout. Seriously. It's incredible. Be forewarned that the day cream smells exactly like potting soil. Not a little like potting soil - exactly like it. It also isn't super moisturizing so you may need to supplement with another moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Right?

customer_reviews.title: Found it effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and find it to be effective. I have been battling acne from adolescence to adulthood. The only thing that worked for my acne was being on birth control but then I stopped it because of health concerns. I have used a variety of different acne skincare sets and over the counter products that did not work. This is the first product in a long time that I have found to work and I love it. I like that you can use whatever face wash you want and that it includes some natural ingredients. The products have helped my acne clear up and also makes my skin feel smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I have used these products about a week and half and can already tell a difference in my acne. My face is almost clear now. My skin is a lot dryer and is a little flaky right now but using moisturizer helps significantly. I actually like the scent of the AM product and I'm somewhat sensitive to strong smelling products. The PM product has no scent really. If you have adult acne, I recommend trying this. No product works for everyone but I am personally very pleased so far. I never expected to get results so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: CKN

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this acne treatment so far
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this acne treatment so far. I think it is still too soon to tell how well it is really helping. I will say that I break out when I use sunscreen and after several days of consistent sunscreen wear, my face was downright horrible. I applied these two products and could tell a difference within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Adult acne is something I've been battling for a couple years with combination skin. These products have helped clear it up with consistent use. I signed up for the subscription to have it shipped monthly but it still says currently unavailable. Im hoping it's back in stock by the time I need more. I'd hate to be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Herrin

customer_reviews.title: I honestly did not want to like this product as much as I do
customer_reviews.text: I honestly did not want to like this product as much as I do. It's more pricey than I usually spend for skin care (I'm historically just a "whatever is on sale at the pharmacy" kind of girl), but this stuff works so well and smells great. I've really noticed my skin cleared up and stayed clear when I use it. The one (SIGNIFICANT) down side is that the nighttime solution has peroxide in it, which will discolor your pillow cases and anything else that touches your face. White pillow cases turn yellow, and any darker-colored fabrics are turned into a sort of yellow-orange.
customer_reviews.author: Elicia Fox

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! and cheaper than rodan and fields!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was using Rodan and fields unblemish regime but it was just too expensive. I switched to dualosophy and after about 5-6 weeks my skin is almost perfectly clear. Took a while to see results but I'm so happy I stuck with it. I am so happy with my purchase. Buying again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice (at least the AM formula)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. My girlfriend loved it. She has tried a number of other treatments to no great effect, but this one worked and she loved the tea tree smell on the AM formula. Not sure why you need two separate bottles, but meh, I guess it works.
customer_reviews.author: Aeron Hammack

customer_reviews.title: I like the morning moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like the morning moisturizer, but unfortunately I'm super allergic to the night time one. I have super sensitive skin, so this isn't the company's fault at all, I should have known better. If you have super sensitive skin like myself, I wouldn't recommend this. Otherwise I would say try it but be aware it's pretty drying and needs additional moisturizer after or you'll have flaky skin.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Scifres

customer_reviews.title: but I am extremely happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: It's been about a week and a half (a little longer for me than people in other postings) to see improvement, but I am extremely happy with this product. Although it is currently unavailable on Amazon, I would definitely buy this again once I begin running low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I was using just benzol before and started to plate, so I decided to change it up. I was worried that changing products would make me break out again, but theae two products were awesome at keeping my face in check. They won't dry your face and they are not greasy. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Clearest I've Seen My Girlfriend's Skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend who sometimes experiences acne. After using this a few weeks, her skin looked the clearest I've ever seen it, which is even more impressive given that she previously used acne products that cost over 10x as much as this product. Her only complaints were the scent of the product and the "cheap" packaging (remember, she's accustomed to expensive products).
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for a week and can't believe how ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a week and can't believe how much my skin is improved. I am 46 years old and have been dealing with adult acne. Nothing has helped up to this point. I only wish I had taken before and after pictures. I almost don't believe it myself!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I developped really bad cystic acne after giving birth. The acne was painful. Lots of red. This improved my face about 80%. Love this! Hope it gets restocked soon.
customer_reviews.author: Camper Matt

customer_reviews.title: I love that there's a daytime and night regimen
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying DualCare Acne Treatment and it has worked so well. I love that there's a daytime and night regimen, and they have different purposes. My skin has already cleared up after a few days and I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I tried this dual treatment out. I had some recent acne breakouts that I blame on going to the gym more often. I've used DualCare for two weeks now, and it seems to help a lot. No issues with the AM one--smells great, btw! My skin got somewhat dry at first with the PM one, but now I use it only once every two nights. I apply it about 30 minutes before bed, and it hasn't bleached my pillow.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Scientific Solution to Acne Treatment
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have been looking for an effective acne treatment for my teenage daughter who also has sensitive skin. This is a great solution where the treatment and skin nurturing regimen are separated and provided in one kit. The nice Tea Tree smell is a bonus. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says. Simple and quick to use. Great for lazy people.
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty consistent mild acne and this is already starting to clear it up. For someone lazy like me, this is a great option. Who really wants to get out of bed for a 7 step process that takes all morning? No one. Give me the easy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty bad acne. There are months when I don't get it for a while then there are months where all i do is break out huge pimples all over my face. This has been such a Godsend as it has allowed my face to stabilize and my breakouts have been very minimal if any.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Acne Treatment!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece. She used it and is very happy with it! Her face cleared up significantly within two weeks and she will continue using it. The two separate bottles aren’t complicated — and it works. This is an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works as Miracle
customer_reviews.text: This is the best acne treatment system. I have tried everything to get rid of acne like clinque, various acne face wash and some home remedies too. But this product showed best result in just 2 weeks. I used to apply the am regime once in morning and pm regime just before sleeping. This has done complete miracle on my face. Must buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: vikul gupta

customer_reviews.title: Thank you dualosophy!
customer_reviews.text: Dualosophy delivers results! I experience acne combined with mild eczema as an adult. The a.m. and p.m. lotions are effective in reducing acne and eczema without drying out my skin. My skin looks clearer and feels silky. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: smm

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my dualosophy product about 2 weeks ago. The formula for clearing up individual outbreaks is really effective. The daily lotion has a pleasant fragrance and keeps my face smooth and soft. I recommend this product to anyone who would like to see a significant improvement in his or her acne problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best find for my skin
customer_reviews.text: DualCare has significantly reduced the number of breakouts and I'm so so so thankful. Wish they would offer a bigger size option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing product! Love it, skin looking much better than ever.

customer_reviews.title: Both moisturizers are very easy to apply and spread out to skin
customer_reviews.text: Both moisturizers are very easy to apply and spread out to skin. The pm regimen smells great and I feel refreshing and also calm after the application.
customer_reviews.author: YANG KAI

customer_reviews.title: Night and day time treatments are easy to manage and get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Dualosophy is a godsend! I've been looking for an effective acne treatment for years and finally found one that does the trick. Night and day time treatments are easy to manage and get the job done. The ointments are moisturizing and leave my skin feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Muhr

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for Combination/sensitive skin & Adult Acne
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! I used to struggle with frustrating combination skin and adult acne but this combination has worked wonders!

customer_reviews.title: once in the morning an dtwice in the afternoon (2nd time before she goes to sleep) and it works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow! My daughter uses this; once in the morning an dtwice in the afternoon (2nd time before she goes to sleep) and it works like magic!! Before her pimples honestly made you want to grab proactive and just shower her with it like holy water (she told me to say that) and now...almost nothing left!shes been using this for less than a month; and the results are extremely visible.👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent,  great on my African American skin
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, works very well on African American skin! Runs in nicely, moisturizes well. Does not leave my skin dry. Strongly recommend this product. Will keep in my skincare regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Blamoh T

customer_reviews.title: It is the best acne treatment and moisturizer in one for every skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different acne treatments and products, but they always stop working after a short while or don't work at all. This is the only product that works for me. It is the best acne treatment and moisturizer in one for every skin type. Highly recommended!!!! I love it!!!! My skin finally looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lidia  Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Dual care is such an awesome product. Blemishes are gone in a day or two without drying, burning or discoloring your skin. Love the fact it works overnight. Great product for everyday or when you have a random breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Boone

customer_reviews.title: Finally an Acne treatment that works !
customer_reviews.text: It's been about 3 weeks and so far it's worked really well for me. Dualosophy leaves my skin with a nice balance and doesn't dry up my skin like most products out there. Definitely recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These guys really care about their customers amd are happy to work with you to answer any questions
customer_reviews.text: These guys really care about their customers amd are happy to work with you to answer any questions. The product has every ingredient you could ask for for healthy clear skin!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I saw a beginning positive response within about five days. No skin irritation or systemic reaction at all. I will buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: You should try this product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product - nice presentation, easy and comfortable to apply and seems to be working well. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Better than Proacitv Bought this for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Better than Proacitv Bought this for my daughter, who has adolescent acne. Cleared it up quickly. This worked much better than proacitv.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Product works excellent for teenage acne!
customer_reviews.text: My son, 17 years old, was suffering from teenage acne .... within a week of using this product, he doesn't have any acne!!! This product worked EXCELLENT. His sister, 19, 'stole' the product and a fight broke out ... suffice it to say, I purchased a second set.
customer_reviews.author: RhonwenReview

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This products has cleared up my teenagers face within a week. It's an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Baker

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this product. It works better than other products I've tried. I especially like the moisturizing properties of the AM tea tree formula.
customer_reviews.author: yoshi san

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dry out skin
customer_reviews.text: An acne treatment that did not immediately leave my skin feeling dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I still have small break outs but nothing like I used to
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a month. My face was extremely broken out along my jaw line when I started using it. I just wash my face with soap and apply each cream depending on the time of the day. I reapply if I've been sweating or if I wore make up and just washed it off. It has lightened some scarring from previous break outs and kept my face fairly clear. I still have small break outs but nothing like I used to. I do wish it were a bit cheaper. One package lasts about a month and a half for me. I just signed up to receive this as a subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: If you'd like to be acne free like I am, look no further than dualosophy!
customer_reviews.author: Sri Rama Prasanna Pavani

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work For Us.
customer_reviews.text: We had high hopes for this product but it did not work for us. My son had a painful stinging reaction to the PM formula requiring him to immediately wash it off thoroughly. In all fairness he may have been allergic to it in which case it is not the fault of the company if that was the case. It also had a distinct almost bleach/chlorine like smell to it which was unpleasant. I tried it myself and the product was too harsh for my sensitive prone to dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: MiyazakiFan

customer_reviews.title: some make the situation even worse by creating scaly dry patches everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Most of the acne treatments on the market are harsh on the skin. Instead of doing just what they promise, some make the situation even worse by creating scaly dry patches everywhere, while others completely fail at their promises. DualCare not only combats current acne, it also helps prevent future breakouts AND doesn't dry out skin at all. It's actually soothing. Definitely a huge fan of this and will stay on it until I get back to a clear complexion and no trace of dark spots.
customer_reviews.author: Gio Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: It's just not for me. I did this for ...
customer_reviews.text: It's just not for me. I did this for a month and no results at all. Did a before and after having picture taken everyday just too make sure if I actually see a difference. Turns out nothing. Not saying this product doesn't work. It just doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: great for acne treatment
customer_reviews.text: I like this for my acne treatment and like that it is not overpriced. I am a 30 something who is fighting mild acne and fine lines with dry skin. This product did not dry my skin out like other creams I have tried. Plus I like that it only has 3% benzoyl peroxide as more is typically not needed.
customer_reviews.author: saryhi

customer_reviews.title: Good so far...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for a week, but so far so good. It hasn't caused any new breakouts, so that's always a good sign for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: CelenaM

customer_reviews.title: Clearing up after 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I used this for 2 weeks and already seeing results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After weeks and of use I feel like my skin has gotten
customer_reviews.text: Didn't help my skin. After weeks and of use I feel like my skin has gotten worse
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not use if you've ever had a sensitivity to benzoyl peroxide. My face swelled up enormously and then broke out in a rash. I now have more problem areas than before I started using it. Fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great option for people with dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: Historically I'd always felt that I had to choose between acne and dry skin, but now I can have my cake and eat it too! I saw results within the first 24 hours of use (way quicker than I expected) both in clearing my complexion and moisturizing my skin. I have eczema so a lot of products irritate my skin, but I've been using this for a week so far and I've had nothing but positive results.
customer_reviews.author: tkessler

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This works much better than any other single component, and I have tried them all. I think it is because, as mentioned in the literature, the two incompatible components are not mixed together and allowed to react before being applied to the skin. Each component has a chance to work independently and perform its' function better on the skin in the morning and evening. Plus the light sensitive component is used at night so it has long time to work overnight.
customer_reviews.author: TopCat

customer_reviews.title: but I really feel inclined to tell people about this product after being told 5 times today I had great skin. All other acne medications have dried my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before, but I really feel inclined to tell people about this product after being told 5 times today I had great skin. All other acne medications have dried my skin out horribly. This is gentle, but effective. I've had no pimples since using this-not even little bumps and no blackheads. It doesn't over dry, therefore, my skin has this great, luminous quality to it. Guys, this is the stuff, seriously.
customer_reviews.author: S. Felzien

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew, he's 23 and has extreme acne since he was a teenager, some leaving acne scars. He's been using this face cleanser and moisturizer for 2-3 mos now along with acnetame pills and apple cider vinegar tablets. This has worked wonders for him, after just 3 weeks we saw a huge improvement and now his face is 95% clear and he's having less and less breakouts. He is so excited, before he was embarassed to go out because people would stare, that's how severe his acne WAS but now he holds his head up high - thank you, WE LOVE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Feels heavy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product about every other day for a couple weeks now and I don’t like it. I haven’t noticed any improvement in my skin and the lotions feel heavy and a little greasy. My pores seem more clogged since I started using this. Maybe it will be better for other people’s skin, but it did not work for me. Update: I tried using it again and it just made my skin worse
customer_reviews.author: B. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: ... products for a few weeks and they have been great! I like how the one at night helps ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the products for a few weeks and they have been great! I like how the one at night helps moisturize the skin. Both treatments combined create a good balance, I feel they just work well together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable acne treatment
customer_reviews.text: This is quite a good product. Benzoyl peroxide in the first formulation is an effective way to clear acne flare-ups, while the witch hazel, willow bark and tea tree oil of the second formulation gently keep your skin moist and supple. Overall I have found this combination to not contribute to skin dryness, especially when paired with a moisturizer. I recommend this product for its simplicity and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with mild to moderate adult acne for the past 5 years or so and have tried many products. This is the first one to 100% clear my skin! It has actually improved the texture as well. I would recommend this to anyone dealing with adult acne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Skin Breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set of products for skin problems. I have had a rash of small blisters on my face for months. On my dermatologist's recommendation, I looked for a product containing benzoyl peroxide. I purchased dualosophy's DualCare Acne Treatment System with tea tree oil, and it has been very effective in minimizing my breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fast Results
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for only 5 days and the results are amazing. The combination of the two formulas (for daytime and night time) makes for a winning balance.

customer_reviews.title: Ok product!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and I already used the am lotion! So excited to try it tonight. It left my face very shined! Kind of really irritated me & dried my skin out. Just switched to Clinique.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I'm using it as instructed along with a spot treatment for cystic acne. My face does look better. I'm reserving five starts for when I've used it a bit more, but I like the dual plan.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter has only been using a few days but I already notice a difference. Her skin looks brighter and smoother. The small amount of acne she had is clearing up already!

I sometimes use that one for night rather than the white cream. Anyway, it reduced my breakouts and started making my skin smooth. I have excema and it helps take it away. I know use acne gone too and it works with that product well. I am almost done with this product so I will have to buy more. It really helps the blemishes. oh yeah and I am a women of color so it really works.

customer_reviews.text: After struggling with acne for almost a decade, this is the only product I've ever used that didn't make my skin too dry! I noticed results within the first few days & my skin is so smooth. Worth every penny.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used proactive for years, but no longer was working. This works wonders for my skin and simpler regimen. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.text: I was looking for affordable Benzoyl Peroxide in more of a lotion form. Proactiv always worked well for me, but its expensive and the automatic shipments leave you with a surplus of stuff you don't need. This is stuff is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: I did not try the product as the box appeared ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not try the product as the box appeared to have been opened. Neither bottle had any kind of seal.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Not just for teenagers
customer_reviews.text: This product is gentle and mild. I was very pleased that it effectively cleans my skin without triggering rosacea redness or bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn from Austin

customer_reviews.title: Finally clear!
customer_reviews.text: I love this night and day system. Cleared up some lingering acne on my face and back.
customer_reviews.author: catwings

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a return customer and I have to say that this most recent shipment is NOT like the previous. The night regimen is much more runny and doesn't smell as much...almost like it's diluted. And that's not to mention the fact that I only have half of my day regimen because it leaked all over the place in transit. Probably won't be returning to order again... Edited to add: the seller promptly provided a refund. Much appreciated and good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently bought DualCare and I have been using it 2 weeks. Even after such a short time period, I already see it working miracles on my skin. I would definitely recommend it if you're struggling with too many imperfections - you will finally be relieved looking in the mirror and seeing the skin going back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Stanowska

customer_reviews.title: Best to use during winter as an acne treatment
customer_reviews.text: I began using this product during the winter and I found the daytime lotion to be helpful in relieving some of the dryness, however, overall it did not help significantly with my acne and once the weather temperatures became hot again, it made my skin feel oily.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia S.

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: I think this works if your skin isn't sensitive. I couldn't even use one of the bottles because it irritated my face so much.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: This product has (had) a 5 star rating from every customer. I thought if so many people say this $45 set is five stars, I'll try it. It made my face worse, but I stuck it out. It's been 5 weeks though, and the results that everyone was so happy about are not happening for me. Maybe it will work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER W

customer_reviews.title: My acne got worst. I just tossed it in the trash can ...
customer_reviews.text: This product made me break out even more with in 2 weeks of using it. My acne got worst. I just tossed it in the trash can after the 2 weeks. Really disappointed. I would like my money back if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth trying!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for abt 3 weeks now my cystic acne is healing. Let’s see if it prevents the cystic acne from growing. Definitely helped with current ones I had in the face. Worth trying! Does not over dry. Tea tree smell is potent but not unbearable. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Syeda B.

product_meta.title: DualCare Acne Treatment System: Organic Tea Tree Oil and 3% Benzoyl Peroxide Lotions.
product_meta.description: dualosophy's dualcare is a next-generation anti-acne regimen that provides deep-pore delivery of 3% Benzoyl Peroxide in combination with organic Tea Tree Oil. This two-component kit, which consists of a morning (AM) and nighttime (PM) regimen, works synergistically to eliminate acne while moisturizing and nourishing the skin, day and night. By physically separating the Benzoyl Peroxide, which is oxidizing, and Tea Tree Oil, an anti-oxidant, dualcare overcomes the inherent instability that results when the two are mixed together. Furthermore, by incorporating benzoyl peroxide into the PM regimen, dualcare effectively eliminates the photosensitivity concern associated with Benzoyl Peroxide and the burdensome requirement for co-application of sunscreen. Fight acne day and night with dualcare. Great for adult acne or adolescent acne.
feature_bullets: We are going out of business. The product will become unsellable in May due to the official expiration date.
Acne treatment rapidly kills bacteria and helps prevent future breakouts. Smooth lotion absorbs quickly.
TEA TREE OIL is a Gentle yet Potent Anti-bacterial: Organic Tea Tree Oil exhibits soothing anti-inflammatory action while eliminating problematic bacteria like P. acnes.

BENZOYL PEROXIDE WORKS: On the World Health Organization's "List of Essential Medicines," Benzoyl Peroxide is the first-line therapy for acne, and its clinical efficacy has been rigorously demonstrated. dualcare is specially formulated to mitigate the unpleasant drying effects some experience with use of Benzoyl Peroxide.
ORGANICALLY SOURCED botanical extracts including Aloe Vera, Centella Asiatica, Green Tea, Witch Hazel, Willow Bark, and Calendula calm the skin while Vitamins B3, B5, C, and E nourish.
